text: wqal almalik laewanh: 'ukhrijuu alrajul almebbir lilruwya min alsijn wahdrwh ly, falamaa ja'ah rasul almalik yadeuh qal yusuf llrswl: 'arjie 'iilaa sydk almaliki, watlb minh 'an yas'al alniswat allaati jrhn 'aydiahuna ean hqyqt amrhn wshanhn mey; ltzhr alhaqiqat lljmye, wttdh bra'ty, 'iina rabiy ealim bsnyehn wafealhn la yakhfaa ealayh shay' min dhlk
